title: Ralph-Beads v0.1.0 Implementation
description:
## Goal
Implement the ralph-beads Claude Code plugin based on specifications in specs/.

## Specs to Implement
- specs/loop-architecture.md - Core architecture (bd prime, circuit breaker, molecules)
- specs/core-workflow.md - Planning/building modes
- specs/beads-integration.md - Task selection, logging, state
- specs/commands.md - Slash commands

## Development Approach
Use spec-driven development:
1. Read specs for acceptance criteria
2. Create child tasks from criteria
3. Implement and validate
4. Close when all criteria met

## Key Features
- bd prime context reload every iteration
- Molecule-based workflow execution
- Circuit breaker (block after 2 failures)
- Wisp support for discovered work

title: Validate bd prime integration in startup ritual

comments.author: briansquires
comments.text:
Validated bd prime integration. Key findings:
- bd prime doesn't support --mol flag (provides global context)
- Molecule scope achieved via bd ready --mol instead
- Fixed all docs referencing incorrect bd prime --mol syntax
- Added fallback guidance if bd prime fails
- Documented .beads/PRIME.md customization option

Files updated: commands/ralph-beads.md, specs/loop-architecture.md, docs/architecture.md, CLAUDE.md

title: Test molecule workflow (pour, progress, wisp, squash)

comments.author: briansquires
comments.text:
Validated molecule workflow. Key findings:
- All mol commands (pour, progress, current, ready --mol) require --no-daemon flag
- bd mol wisp takes proto-id, not ad-hoc task strings
- For ad-hoc ephemeral tasks use: bd create --ephemeral --title='...'
- Updated all docs to reflect actual beads CLI behavior

Tested: pour, progress, current, ready --mol, wisp, burn
Files updated: commands/ralph-beads.md, CLAUDE.md, specs/loop-architecture.md

title: Implement circuit breaker pattern (2 failures max)

comments.author: briansquires
comments.text:
Implemented circuit breaker pattern. Key findings:
- Use bd update <id> --status=blocked (not just label) to hide from bd ready
- Use bd comments add (not deprecated bd comment)
- Tested: status=blocked correctly removes task from bd ready results
- Updated all docs with correct syntax

Files updated: commands/ralph-beads.md, CLAUDE.md, specs/loop-architecture.md

title: Test planning mode with proto creation
description:
## Goal
Validate planning mode creates proper proto structure.

## Test Steps
1. Run `/ralph-beads --mode plan --dry-run "Test feature"`
2. Verify epic creation with `template` label
3. Verify task creation under epic
4. Verify dependencies form valid DAG
5. Test completion promise `<promise>PLAN_READY</promise>`

title: Test building mode with molecule execution
description:
## Goal
Validate building mode executes molecule workflow correctly.

## Test Steps
1. Create a test proto manually
2. Run `/ralph-beads --mode build --epic <proto-id> --dry-run`
3. Verify molecule creation via `bd mol pour`
4. Verify `bd ready --mol` scoping works
5. Verify circuit breaker triggers after 2 failures
6. Test completion promise `<promise>DONE</promise>`

## Files to Validate
- commands/ralph-beads.md (BUILDING MODE PROMPT section)
- specs/core-workflow.md (REQ-002)
- specs/loop-architecture.md (REQ-032 circuit breaker)
